scenarios.title: Tax Reform Debate
scenarios.description: Should we introduce new tax legislation to address growing income inequality?

options.title: Introduce Progressive Tax
options.description: Increase taxes on the wealthy to fund education and healthcare.
options.risk: May face backlash from businesses and wealthy donors.

options.title: Cut Corporate Taxes
options.description: Lower taxes for businesses to encourage investments.
options.risk: Could increase the wealth gap and public unrest.

scenarios.title: Military Spending Increase
scenarios.description: Should we allocate more funds for national defense amidst rising global tensions?

options.title: Increase Spending
options.risk: May lead to budget cuts in social programs.

options.title: Freeze Spending
options.risk: Could weaken global influence and military readiness.
